languages.text: "///Ты назвал{mf||а} нас "почтенным духом" и просил{mf||а} защитить от гибели".

traits.locale_text: "///Ты назвал{mf||а} нас "почтенным духом" и просил{mf||а} защитить от гибели".
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."
languages.original_text: "///Ты назвал{mf||а} нас "почтенным духом" и просил{mf||а} защитить от гибели".

traits.locale_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

traits.locale_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

traits.locale_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

traits.locale_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

traits.locale_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: 「///あなたは我々を『神聖な精霊』と呼び、あなたを破滅から守るよう言いました」
languages.original_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."

traits.locale_text: 「///あなたは我々を『神聖な精霊』と呼び、あなたを破滅から守るよう言いました」
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: “///你称我们为‘神圣的机魂’，请求我们保护你免遭厄运。”
languages.original_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."

traits.locale_text: “///你称我们为‘神圣的机魂’，请求我们保护你免遭厄运。”
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: "///Ihr habt uns einen 'heiligen Geist genannt' und uns gebeten, Euch vor Eurem Untergang zu bewahren."
languages.original_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."

traits.locale_text: "///Ihr habt uns einen 'heiligen Geist genannt' und uns gebeten, Euch vor Eurem Untergang zu bewahren."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: « ///Vous nous avez qualifiés de "saint esprit" et nous avez demandé de vous préserver du malheur. »
languages.original_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."

traits.locale_text: « ///Vous nous avez qualifiés de "saint esprit" et nous avez demandé de vous préserver du malheur. »
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: «///Usted nos llamó "espíritu sagrado" y nos pidió que le protegiésemos de cualquier fatalidad».
languages.original_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."

traits.locale_text: «///Usted nos llamó "espíritu sagrado" y nos pidió que le protegiésemos de cualquier fatalidad».
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: "///Bizim 'ulu ruh' olduğumuzu söyleyip sizi felaketinizden korumamızı istediniz."
languages.original_text: "///You called us a 'hallowed spirit' and asked us to guard you against your doom."

traits.locale_text: "///Bizim 'ulu ruh' olduğumuzu söyleyip sizi felaketinizden korumamızı istediniz."
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual
